The objective of the the vixr package is the replication of the volatility index (VIX). Thereby, it features four primary functions
  vix_calc: This function takes as an input 
  fitVIX
```{r}
library(vixr)
SampleData <- data.frame('VIX' = runif(450, 9, 9.7))
fitVIX(SampleData, fit_type = 'smooth.spline')

```{r}
